-----------Enter bugs above this line-----------
RSE 1.0 Testing round 2
installation : eclipse-SDK-3.2.1 (M20060921-0945), cdt-3.1.1
RSE install  : RSE-SDK-1.0RC1.zip
java.runtime : 1.5.0_06-b05
os.name:     : Linux 2.4.20-8
------------------------------------------------
systemtype   : Linux (FTP-only)
targetos     : Linux 2.4.20-8
targetvm     : 1.5.0_06-b05
------------------------------------------------

When deleting a file filter, it gives the following error message:

Unexpected error deleting test1
Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)

To reproduce:
1) create a connection of type FTP-only
2) establish the connection
3) Create a new File filter by selecting Files->New->Filter
4) Once the new file filter is created, select the newly created file filter in Remote Systems view and right click to open the context menu and perform a delete. Click on the delete button to confirm the delete.
5) You will get one error message dialog with title "Resource Changed" with message "Error". And another message dialog with title "RSEG1063U" with message: Unexpected error deleting test1.
You will have to close the RSEG1063U dialog first then close the resource changed dialog before you can continue.

java.lang.Exception

If "Only create filter in this connection" is checked then there is no "Unexpected error deleting <filter-name>" error.
I cannot reproduce this. Please verify that this has been fixed.
